name: Dream League Soccer Stars 2019
description:
Football is no more a sport to watch just on tv but you can actually play football games yourself in your mobile. All you have to do is download this 3D Soccer game in your phone. Arena will be like a real soccer stadium so you would experience true football battle in virtual ultimate football championship. Leave no chance to your opponent and be a dream football manager. Keep soccer ball under your feet and dribble, kick, move, pass as per the condition on the field.
Keep an eye on football scores. Never let your best soccer team down on the ground. Keep engaged all your football players to improve football skills. Like every football match this game has penalty corners and shoots. You will have to win the tournament by attacking all the time in football field. With your patience you can win against every football legend. But if your lose patience enemy will crush you like an ant.
What it takes to improve your soccer skills? Just a little practice. So you just have to practice and ultimate win will be yours. Never give up because game with best football physics is in your hands. To be a football hero you will have to play like messy and ronaldo. With your dream soccer team come in the ground and with dribbling, shoots and corners with the football match. No one can stop you from becoming true football superstar.
You are a pro football legend as you believe in your soccer skills. But proving this on ground is a whole different story. You will have to face best football clubs to win the league. In this fantasy game you can control the players by simple controls provided on the screen and kick or pass as soon as you find it necessary. As you know every football match needs to be won in a limited time so this game has time limit to make it more realistic and addictive.

Modes :
Game has two modes
1 - Quick Match
You will play against top football country of your choice
2 - League
You will play football in a league style so you will have to advance through rounds to reach final and ultimately the cup

Features of game :
1 - Huge soccer arena
2 - Amazing animations of football players movements
3 - Great background sound and music
4 - Features of real soccer match
5 - Play against top football teams
6 -

How to Play this game?
There is a virtual joystick to control movement of soccer players and two soft buttons i.e kick and pass. You can move player
